metadata.dc:author: Yanes Díaz, L
Fuentes González, O
Hernández, L R
metadata.dc:description: Parasitism present in others of Periplaneta americana in 3 municipalities of Havana City was observed, and it was detected that Tetrastichus hagenowii (Ratz.) attained significant levels of parasitism for an average value of 21.5% in the oothecae revised. Their presence in locations where different pesticides are used and their biological characteristics give them the probability of being an efficient bioregulator of cockroaches.
metadata.dc:title: Parasitismo en ootecas de Periplaneta americana (Linnaeus).
[Parasitism in the oothecae of Periplaneta americana (Linnaeus)].
